summary_text: Overall strong ROAS, but some creative fatigue is evident. Retargeting audiences perform the best, while broad audiences require optimization. US and Facebook platforms show better performance.

insights.title: Retargeting Audiences Outperforming Others
insights.description: Retargeting audiences demonstrate significantly higher ROAS compared to Lookalike and Broad audiences.

insights.title: Potential Creative Fatigue
insights.description: Several creatives with high impressions are showing a lower ROAS, indicating potential fatigue. Focus on refreshing these creatives or testing new ones.

creative_issues: Multiple creatives with high impressions and declining ROAS observed.

creative_issues.creative_message: Wire‑free ease, cloud‑soft cups — women sports bras that fits right.
Push comfort, not wires — everyday women panties.

insights.title: US Market Provides Best Performance
insights.description: The US market yields the highest ROAS and revenue compared to IN and UK. Consider allocating more budget to this region.

insights.title: Facebook Platform Performing Better
insights.description: Facebook demonstrates slightly higher ROAS and revenue compared to Instagram.

insights.title: Identify Underperforming Creatives
insights.description: Several creatives have very low ROAS. These creatives should be paused or replaced to improve overall campaign performance.

creative_issues.creative_message: Breathable modal that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras.

insights.title: Broad Audience Optimization Needed
insights.description: Broad audiences show the lowest ROAS. Refine targeting or test new creative approaches to improve performance with this audience segment.

insights.title: Clicks Do Not Directly Correlate to Revenue
insights.description: Some of the best creatives have a high CTR, but a relatively low ROAS. Explore and test new strategies, or messaging within these ads.
